channel.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
channel.description:
Welcome to Carnage's Evolution.
After working on this for 7 months now, I'm ready to release it. Needless to say, this is a quality server.
Created by: King Lingerz (Carnage) Source: Massimo Server Other Source: Palidino76
Some pictures:
Logo: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Logo.jpg[/img]
Starting: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Starter.jpg[/img]
Shops: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Shops-1.jpg[/img]
Trading: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Trading.jpg[/img]
Ancients: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Ancients.jpg[/img]
KBD: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/KBD.jpg[/img]
KQ: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/KQ.jpg[/img]
Storylines: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Mole.jpg[/img]
Dialogue: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/PlayerDialogue.jpg[/img]
Barrows: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Dharok-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Killcount2.jpg[/img]
Quests: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Quests.jpg[/img]
Dharok's effect + Jad: [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Deadlycombos.jpg[/img]
Features with no pics:
Working sound system (only missing a few) Couple of glitches NPC Aggression and following Barrows effects (need more work) Unattackable NPC's are unattackable even with mage Examine info on all NPC's and just about every accessible object An event manager that I never got round to using :p
I have included a small anti-leech in here too :). Experienced 508 programmers shouldn't have any trouble sorting it out, but for those who always need help, it's in Engine.java at the process part.
Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?jhhhonmdzzw

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Starter gear should be basic things for you to START with. That armor is stuff you want to achieve. Like in RS. Back in the day, If you had that armor, that was something to be proud of. If you give everyone an excessive starter, what’s the point in trying to achieve anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

zyle1992:

Looks good, except for the ridiculous starter gear. And the glitch where you get 375k in your arrows slot…

Nah, that’s an old pic. It starts in inventory now. And what’s wrong with the starter gear!? Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @Evansnow75 Evansnow75
item.description:
@Evansnow75 wrote:

Thanks King! I thought you meant that so called “experienced programmers” were the only ones allowed to use this, but you helped me… so thanks! And uh… still having trouble finding the anti-leech… i might have deleted some of the wrong things and i don’t know what you mean by general… Sorry! I’m usually pretty good with computers but not this time.

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Evansnow75:

I know your not going to give me any help with this anyway because you want people to figure it out themselves but…

What do you take me for? :eek: Of course I’ll help.

Get back all the files you deleted or redownload
Open Engine.java and hold down CTRL then press F
Type ‘Process’
The antileech is around the general if (curTime - area.

Read full topic

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @Evansnow75 Evansnow75
item.description:
@Evansnow75 wrote:

Ok i swear i sorted out the Anti-leech! I had no idea what java.engine you were talking about until i looked in the src folder and i deleted it. Then i pressed start and typed it engine.java and deleted the other one too. Im not sure if you meant processes as in the manager or what? I know your not going to give me any help with this anyway because you want people to figure it out themselves but… i just need a bit of assistance from any other people of moparscape fourms! Thanks and have a good day!

~Snowman~

Read full topic

item.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“Unforgiven-Gaming, post:3, topic:288088”]It looks really good, I downloaded it fine, changed it to my java version (1.6.0_14)… I ran it and it said “Now starting Carnage Evolution [508]… Please wait…” I waited then it said “Started Carnage’s Evolution on Port: 43594”

Since you didn’t include a client the only 508 client I had was from Berky-scape so I ran that and typed in my no-ip address… it got to the login screen, when I entered my user-name and password it said “logging in” I waited forever, on the server console it said "Incoming Connection recieved from: " but when I looked at the client it said “Error connecting to server” I tried to reconnect but it said “Your account is already logged in, please wait 60 seconds”…

Like I said it looks great and I want to use it, any idea what the problem is?

-Unforgiven[/quote]

Anti-leech.

Read full topic
